sentences.en: Another bank building a strategic toehold in Hong Kong is Bank of Tokyo - Mitsubishi UFJ Ltd.
sentences.cn: 另一家在香港银行业建立战略立足点的银行是三菱东京UFJ银行 (BankofTokyo-MitsubishiUFJ).

sentences.en: Delta`s agreement with Singapore Airlines gave them a toehold in the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 德尔塔与新加坡航空公司的协议为他们在太平洋地区提供了一个立足点。

sentences.en: Family connections gave her a toehold in politics.
sentences.cn: 家庭关系使她在政治上获得了初步的立脚点.

sentences.en: It has even found a toehold in the frigid polar regions and in toxic dumps.
sentences.cn: 在刺骨的两极地带和有毒废物中,生命也找到了立足之境.

sentences.en: Mitsubishi Motors were anxious to get a toehold in the European market.
sentences.cn: 三菱汽车急于在欧洲市场上取得初步的立足之地。

sentences.en: The firm is anxious to gain a toehold in Europe.
sentences.cn: 这家公司急于在欧洲找个立脚点。

trans.tran_cn: 攀登悬崖时的小立足点，排除障碍的方法
trans.tran_en: your first involvement in a particular activity, from which you can develop and become stronger
